about_the_game:
For video creators and streamers
KIMIDORI SOFT permits monetization through video distribution and other means using KIMIDORI SOFT games.

A hard-action adventure game depicting the love and resilience of a boiled egg.

Roll through various stages accompanied by poignant music, all aiming for the ultimate destination: the pot.

"I may be a soft-boiled newbie, but I'm going on an adventure to become a tough, hard-boiled egg...!"

Game Objective:
Control a boiled egg, utilizing movement and jumps to reach the pot and become a hard-boiled egg. However, as a soft-boiled egg, you are fragile. Your durability decreases each time you hit a wall or the floor. If your durability reaches zero, it's game over.

Game Features:
Online Multiplayer: Fellow half-boiled comrades (eggs) are also adventuring in the same world, and you might occasionally encounter them. These fellow eggs may be exploring at their own pace, but their determination is anything but half-hearted. Let's praise and encourage each other! You can cheer them on in your heart. If a comrade falls before reaching their goal, their will is dropped on the spot (a recovery item will appear). Up to 10 players can play together.

Boost Jump: If you jump again the moment you land, you can jump a little higher. This is an essential technique.

Continue Flag: Place a flag to create a respawn point. If you get a game over, the flag will be reset.

Hidden Item: For boiled eggs, is it salt? Soy sauce? It's mayonnaise, right! Mayonnaise is hidden somewhere. Try to find it.

Growth System: The more you move, the more your egg's durability increases. Even if it's difficult, if you keep challenging yourself, you'll become tougher and tougher, making it easier to clear the game. You'll be captivated by the resilience of the boiled egg as your spirit of exploration grows.

name: LOST EGG the Hard Boiled

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1050Ti or AMD Radeon RX560
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
